short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends the Developer Tools, adding an ability to open resources in an editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a companion extension for https://www.npmjs.com/package/open-in-editor-connect middleware. It adds the "Open in Editor" item to the context menus of the Chrome DevTools to open files in an external editor quickly.
